update OAAS_PRIV_DATA_DATA
DATA_DATA_CODE = #{dataDataCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_DATA_NAME = #{dataDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update OAAS_PRIV_DATA_DATA set DATA_DATA_CODE = #{dataDataCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_DATA_NAME = #{dataDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCOPE_TYPE = #{scopeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_TYPE = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where DATA_DATA_ID = #{dataDataId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OAAS_PRIV_DATA_DATA AS OPDD LEFT JOIN OAAS_PRIV_DATA_SCOPE_TYPE AS OPDST ON OPDST.SCOPE_TYPE = OPDD.SCOPE_TYPE
OPDST.SCOPE_TYPE = #{scopeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from OAAS_PRIV_DATA_DATA where SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId} AND SCOPE_TYPE = #{scopeType}
mapper.select: select * from OAAS_PRIV_DATA_DATA where SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId} AND SCOPE_TYPE = #{scopeType}
